FuncDef: The state command configures the state of a local access user. The state command configures the state of a local access user. By default, a local access user is in active state after being created. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.

ParaDef.Info:
Permit the user to deal with the authen request.
-

Prohibits the user(s) from dealing with the authentication request.
-
